svg.text: Showroom Blog Generator Workflow
INPUTS: What the Skill Asks For
• Source module file paths (workshop or demo modules)
• Target platform (Red Hat Developer, Medium, dev.to, internal blogs)
• Blog type (technical tutorial, product announcement, thought leadership)
• Technical depth level and word count preference
PROCESS: What the Skill Does
1. Reads all specified source module files
2. Extracts key concepts, procedures, business value propositions
3. Transforms content based on source type:
- Workshop → Developer tutorial (narrative how-to flow)
- Demo → Product announcement (business benefits)
- Workshop → Marketing blog (outcomes, not steps)
- Demo → Thought leadership (patterns, best practices)
4. Generates Markdown (.md) format by default
5. Applies platform-specific formatting (code blocks, syntax highlighting)
6. Adds source traceability attribution (links back to Showroom lab)
7. Validates with technical-editor and style-enforcer agents
OUTPUTS: What It Produces
✓ Complete blog post in Markdown (.md) format
✓ Metadata section (title, description, tags, author)
✓ Image reference list and SEO recommendations
✓ Source attribution (links to original Showroom workshop)
Saved to blog-posts/<topic-slug>.md - ready for publication
